title: The Noise of Infinite Longing: A Memoir of a Family--and an Island
description: Traces the evolution and eventual disintegration of the author's family in Puerto Rico in the years following her mother's death, describing the career endeavors of her five siblings as well as her personal witness to the overthrow of Marcos in the Phillippines and the beginning of the Aquino revolution. 25,000 first printing.
author: Luisita LÃ³pez Torregrosa
